problem_name: Is it a VOWEL or CONSONANT
body: All submissions for this problem are available.Write a program to take a character $(C)$ as input and check whether the given character is a vowel or a consonant. $NOTE:-$ Vowels are 'A', 'E', 'I', 'O', 'U'. Rest all alphabets are called consonants. ###Input: - First line will contain the character $C$. ###Output: Print "Vowel" if the given character is a vowel, otherwise print "Consonant". ###Constraints - $C$ $will$ $be$ $an$ $upper$ $case$ $English$ $alphabet$ ###Sample Input: Z ###Sample Output: Consonant
languages_supported: C, CPP14, JAVA, PYTH, PYTH 3.6, PYPY, CS2, PAS fpc, PAS gpc, RUBY, PHP, GO, NODEJS, HASK, rust, SCALA, swift, D, PERL, FORT, WSPC, ADA, CAML, ICK, BF, ASM, CLPS, PRLG, ICON, SCM qobi, PIKE, ST, NICE, LUA, BASH, NEM, LISP sbcl, LISP clisp, SCM guile, JS, ERL, TCL, kotlin, PERL6, TEXT, SCM chicken, PYP3, CLOJ, COB, FS
problem_author_html_handle: 4★tanmay28
